title: Social Practice Competency Strengthening Through Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A process for current elementary education practitioners to develop community problem-solving competencies through service-learning projects

learning_goals: Learners understand the service-learning project design process and can propose three or more field-applicable solutions
Learners can develop communication strategies for building community partnerships and implement actual case applications
Learners can analyze the educational significance of service-learning experiences through reflective journaling and document findings in reports

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
